meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tubby.
meanings.sent1: Her cat's tubbiness made it look extra cuddly.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's tubbiness was adorable and endearing.
meanings.sent3: The tubbiness of the teddy bear made it the perfect snuggle buddy.
meanings.sent4: The tubbiness of the clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: The tubbiness of the snowman's belly made everyone smile.

meanings.definition: The condition of having excess fat or weight.
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised him to watch his diet to reduce his tubbiness.
meanings.sent2: Despite her tubbiness, she loved to dance and stay active.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon's tubbiness didn't stop it from climbing trees for treats.
meanings.sent4: The tubbiness of the suitcase made it a challenge to lift.
meanings.sent5: His tubbiness was a reminder to prioritize health and fitness.
